title: Tomato, Red Lentils and Coconut Soup
ingredients:
1 red onion chopped
1cup red lentils, rinsed

2 tablespoons tomato paste
1 can chopped tomatoes. 400grms
1 tablespoon olive oil
1can coconut milk 400ml
3 – 4cups water/stock
Salt and pepper
Fresh parsley or herbs of choice (baby spinach would work too)
method: Heat a Dutch oven, heavy saucepan or a slow cooker.
Add olive oil and red onion, cook about three minutes.
Add tomato paste, lentils and can of tomatoes.
Add water or stock stir and cook for twenty minutes.
You can at this stage use a stick blender to blitz the soup smooth or leave a bit chunky.
Bring back to gentle simmer, serve with a drizzle of olive oil and fresh herbs.
And of course the chunky bread or toast.
